DOC.brief_summary: This study carry see dapagliflozin addition metformin effective safe treat patient type 2 diabetes compare glipizide ( sulphonylurea ) addition metformin treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Dapagliflozin Combination With Metformin Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Treated oral antidiabetic drug therapy therapy include Metformin least 8 week prior enrolment HbA1c > 6.5 % < /=10 % Type 1 Diabetes Insulin therapy within one year enrolment Renal ( kidney ) failure dysfunction
